column4: does ubuntu/debian have a feature similar to "yum localinstall" on fedora and redhat enterprise linux?
I want to install a local deb file, but I want it to automatically fetch dependencies too.

dpkg -i lets me install local packages, but no dependencies; "apt-get install" takes care of dependencies but doesn't seem to have a local package option. am i just screwed and have to do this manually?
what package are you trying to install.
